name: bi-service-sdk
description: Exposes common sdk interface & provides client sdk generator for bi-service based apps

scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test; ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --recursive --ui tdd -t 16000 -R spec tests/acceptance tests/unit
scripts.coverage: export NODE_ENV=test; istanbul cover -x ./bin/bi-service-sdk.js node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --recursive --ui tdd -t 16000 -R spec tests/acceptance tests/unit

author: Bohemia Interactive
